 2010-13782010-11-04CITIZENSHIP,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REGUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS, to help clarify the conditions under which foreign In-flight security officers and American designated cross-border maritime law enforcement officers may work in Canada and ensure that their exemption from the work permit requirement is clearly authorized by the regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0253 Publication Date: 2010-11-24
AttachmentsAttachment
